timeline.message: Run the Reformat Code tool on the project

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this line can be removed there were two semicolons and it just split them to different lines
timeline.author: RHenigan

timeline.bodyText: The opening tag is missingalong with "Notes" should these be removed or should they remain? if they should be removed can we also remove the closing tag?
timeline.author: RHenigan
